UserQuiz - Class in fr.epita.quiz_manager.datamodel
Description This UserQuiz class is used to model a special kind of quizzes, which are quizzes taken by a User , it includes 5 fields: Integer id; User user; List<MCQChoice> answers; Quiz quiz; Double score; Usage This class should be used as follows: private UserQuiz instance;
